home.title: Aspiring Developer
home.subintro: I am a Dreamer, Developer and Hungry for success

about.name: Niyaaz Daniels
about.description: I aspire to be a full stack developer and Game Developer. Learning is key in life and to never have a fixed mindset of I Know Enough. I have a keen interest in learning coding, a burning passion to create and to provide. I enjoy helping everyone. I am fueled with energy and passion. When I am not  infront of a device I spend my time with family or nature, nothing more soothing than hearing the wind blow between the trees without our modern day noise. I enjoy having a balance towards everything as too much of something is bad. There's no substitute for hardwork. if it's easy then do it easy, if it's hard than do it hard, just get it done because failure is limitations that you set for yourself, so I choose to be limitless and to become undeniable.
about.experience: 2 years total work experience, I have been exposed to different industry that require high focus for high stress environments, I started working as a call centre agent which required patience, timeliness and empathy towards the customer, followed by working in live events that required patients and understanding and the ability to perform in high stress environments and perform exceptionally while doing so, followed by working as a warehouse storeman, being the sole person responsible of handling customer expectations and request, handling stock and meeting deadlines.
about.title: Aspiring Developer
about.heading: Work Experience

experience.title: Technical Call Centre Agent
experience.description: Assisting customers with technical support telephonically, remotely, and via email. Assisting provided was but is not limited too assisting customers with any internet issues and creating tickets if needed, assisting customers who aren't tech savy through remote assistance, assisting customers with issues such as domain, VOiP and billing concerns.

experience.title: AV Technician in Training
experience.description: Assisted all permanent and freelance technicians with event preparation, on-site setup, site cleanup and checking in of event equipment. Assisted with volunteer events on weekends and public holidays to gain additional experience. Assisted drivers, warehouse staff and project managers with any and all assistance where skills were required and applicable.

experience.title: Warehouse Storeman
experience.description: Solely in charge of warehouse operations, managing, conducting quality assurance checks for new stock arrivals, drafting reports for damaged goods and reporting to chain of command, assisting technical with any inquiries relating product resolutions and stock replacements, assisted sales representatives with reports of expected stock date arrivals and customer Project and delivery, ensured warehouse safety and security, cleanliness and upkeep of inventory for both warehouse and office employees, and much more.

experience.title: Student
experience.description: Coding Bootcamp to learn, understand and design and develop web applications

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Upskilling in areas such as Web Development, Software Engineering, Cyber Security and Networking.

testimonials.name: Matthew
testimonials.testimonial: Niyaaz is a hardworking and dedicated individual. His analytical and creative skills are exceptional. He is confident, shows great work ethic and knows how to work in a team. He's a valuable asset to any development team.

testimonials.name: Daanyaal
testimonials.testimonial: Niyaaz, is a coding wizard! His passion for problem solving shows in his personality and work. He's always ready to help, patient with questions, and fosters a supportive learning environment. Niyaaz is an invaluable asset to my team.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.testimonial: Niyaaz is an extremely hardworking person. His dedication and concentration in his work are genuinely astounding, and he consistently goes above and beyond to get exceptional outcomes. It's a pleasure to work with someone who is so focused and driven.

testimonials.name: Unity
testimonials.testimonial: Niyaaz's proficiency in various programming languages and problem-solving skills are truly impressive. Niyaaz's collaborative nature and willingness to share knowledge have made helped me understand more. Niyaaz works great amongst a team

testimonials.name: Chad
testimonials.testimonial: Niyaaz is great at handling tasks and projects. He's efficient, communicates well, and consistently succeeds in different work environments, showing his capability and effectiveness. His an asset when it comes to teamwork as he knows how to communicate.

testimonials.name: Haanim
testimonials.testimonial: Niyaaz is a hardworking and dedicated person. He is a great person to lead the team with all the characteristics of a leader. I would highly recommend Niyaaz to be a great worker in a team and alone, as well as someone that understands and codes well.

testimonials.name: Zubair
testimonials.testimonial: I highly recommend Niyaaz Daniels for any software development projects. Since known Niyaaz, I've witnessed unparalleled technical proficiency and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions on time.

testimonials.name: Jodi
testimonials.testimonial: Niyaaz is a dedicated person and does his best on each and every project that gets handed to him. He has an amazing personality and conducts himself very professionally. Love him. I highly recommend him for anything position.

projects.name: To-do List
projects.description: I built this to do list project using HTML 5, CSS, and basic Javascript. You're able to add, complete and remove tasks as you wish to do so and the wesbite is fully responsive.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: I built my very first calculator using HTML 5, CSS 3, Javascript. You're able to calculate numbers accordingly and the website is fully responsive and the alignment is correct.

projects.name: Keyboard
projects.description: I built this keyboard project using basic HTML 5 and CSS 3, this is a basic keyboard design without functionality. The website has some responsiveness and alignment is fixed.

projects.name: Netflix
projects.description: I built a replica of netflix using HTML 5 and CSS, the website featueres signup and login features, you have an account view. The website is not responsive and has no functionality.

projects.name: First Ecommerce
projects.description: I built my first ecommerce using HTML 5, CSS, Bootstrap. The website features products, contact and checkout page. No functionality was added and responsiveness needs to be fixed.

projects.name: Second Ecommerce
projects.description: I built my second ecommerce website using HTML 5, CSS, Bootstrap. No functionality within the website however it is responsive and aligned correctly. It is single page view.

projects.name: CapStone Project
projects.description: I designed and build Full Ecommerce Project using all languages that we learnt. Languages used are HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 5, VueJS, NodeJS, MySQL. The website is multiple pages.

projects.name: Node Group Project
projects.description: I devveloped and was responsible for the backend of this project. Languages used on backend are MySQL for the database, NodeJs with ExpressJS. The website is multiple pages.

projects.name: Bootstrap Portfolio
projects.description: created using HTML5, CSS3 and Bootstrap 5. A fully responsive portfolo that makes use of all the aspects learnt over the past 3 months, however it is not aligned fully.
